text: Fear is a 2007 Indian Hindi-language horror film directed by Vikram Bhatt. Starring Amit Gaur, Aditya Ralkar and Alisha Baig, the film was released direct-to-video. ==Cast== *Amit Gaur *Aditya Ralkar *Alisha Baig *Kiran Juneja *Avtar Gill *Kishori Shahane *Tanvi Uday *Vishwas *Gauri Karnik *Ajay Jadhav *Dibyendu Bhattacharya *Mohit Adlakha ==Soundtrack== Joginder Tuteja from Bollywood Hungama gave the album 1.5 stars out of 5, comparing it unfavorably to the soundtrack of Vikram Bhatt's previous horror film Raaz and claiming it would not make an impact as opposed to Bhatt's claim that the soundtrack would "haunt people for centuries." == References == == Other websites == * Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2024 Category:2000s Hindi- language movies Category:2000s Indian movies Category:2007 horror movies
title: Fear (2007 movie)
